question: Cricket: Who will win Pakistan vs. Australia, 2nd ODI, starting March 31?
description:
A One Day International (ODI) is a form of a limited overs cricket game, played between two teams with international status, in which each team faces a fixed number of overs, currently 50, with the game lasting up to 9 hours. 

This market will resolve to whichever national team wins the 2nd ODI between Pakistan and Australia, scheduled for March 31, 2022 (15 AM local - Pakistan time; 6 AM ET). If the game is declared to be tied, to have "no result" or doesn't happen at all before April 7 2022, 6 AM ET - this market will resolve 50/50.
